com.twitter.sdk.android.core

Interface SessionManager<T extends Session>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistedSessionManager

    public interface SessionManager<T extends Session>
    SessionManager for managing sessions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearActiveSession()
      Clears the active session.
      void clearSession(long id)
      Clears the session associated with the id.
      T getActiveSession() 
      T getSession(long id) 
      Map<Long,T> getSessionMap() 
      void setActiveSession(T session)
      Sets the active session.
      void setSession(long id, T session)
      Sets the session to associate with the id.

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveSession

        T getActiveSession()
        Returns:
        the active session, restoring saved session if available

      • setActiveSession

        void setActiveSession(T session)
        Sets the active session.

      • clearActiveSession

        void clearActiveSession()
        Clears the active session.

      • getSession

        T getSession(long id)
        Returns:
        the session associated with the id.

      • setSession

        void setSession(long id,
                T session)
        Sets the session to associate with the id. If there is no active session, this session also becomes the active session.

      • clearSession

        void clearSession(long id)
        Clears the session associated with the id.

      • getSessionMap

        Map<Long,T> getSessionMap()
        Returns:
        the session map containing all managed sessions
